rule: Each classification decision does not have to be mutually exclusive, allowing the input text to be assigned to multiple categories.
input: A player scores in both football and basketball games.
validityText:
The input provided consists of a single sentence: "A player scores in both football and basketball games." According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a complete news article suitable for classification into one of the specified categories. A complete news article typically includes multiple sentences, provides detailed information, context, and possibly quotes or data. The given input lacks the depth and structure of a full news article, making it insufficient for the specified requirements.
